Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Van Buren/Morgan
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Morgan, Harrison and Racine: due to, street blockage near Van Buren/Morgan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Morgan, Harrison and Racine, due to street blockage near Van Buren/Morgan.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #72 North Temporary Eastbound Reroute near North Avenue/Austin
ShortDescription: Eastbound 72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via  North Ave., Austin, Division, and Central due to, street blockage near North Avenue/Austin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via  North Ave., Austin, Division, and Central due to, street blockage near North Avenue/Austin.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with delays at Cottage Grove due to earlier police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with delays at Cottage Grove due to earlier police activity.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored. Allow extra travel time.
